attributes.action: An Alliance with the United States of America
attributes.additional_details:
The UK has a much stronger relationship with the USA than we now do with any other Countries in the European Union.

Surely with such strained relations in Europe as it is on the brink of collapse the UK is now on a sinking ship and for our dignity's sake we are going down with her.

But we don't have to.

The people of the UK and the USA speak the same language and are extremely similar in beliefs and values. So why don't we make our special relationship a more permanent and meaningful fixture.

I want the Government to leave Europe and create a new and stronger alliance with the USA as a replacement to being in the Eurozone.
